outputs.output_descr: The UN Joint Programme on HIV/AIDS is to support the National response in Tanzania mainland and Zanzibar to scale up Universal access to prevention, care and treatment and impact mitigation of the HIV epidemic. Also to strengthen the capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS and Zanzibar AIDS Commission in coordination and M& E of the National response.

donor_name:
UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC &
CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The UN Joint Programme on HIV/AIDS is to support the National response in Tanzania mainland and Zanzibar to scale up Universal access to prevention, care and treatment and impact mitigation of the HIV epidemic. Also to strengthen the capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS and Zanzibar AIDS Commission in coordination and M& E of the National response.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The UN Joint Programme on HIV/AIDS is to support the National response in Tanzania mainland and Zanzibar to scale up Universal access to prevention, care and treatment and impact mitigation of the HIV epidemic. Also to strengthen the capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS and Zanzibar AIDS Commission in coordination and M& E of the National response.

project_descr: National institutional capacity of Tanzania Commission for AIDS (TACAIDS) and Zanzibar AIDS Commission (ZAC) strengthened to effectively lead and coordinate an enhanced, multi-sectoral and quality national response to HIV & AIDS.
project_title: UN Joint Programme on HIV & AIDS
